title: Brad Stuart scratched for Avalanche season opener against Wild
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
Avalanche coach Patrick Roy will scratch defensemen Brad Stuart and Brandon Gormley for Thursday night's season opener against the Minnesota...
